reviewText: Not sure how I feel about calling shuffle strides "forward arcing" and C-cuts "stair stepping" exactly, but in 60 minutes, my defensemen have picked up on all of this and done pretty well with it. Still working on "Niedermayers" and best stick positioning, but "gaining air" has proven to help them not get beat out of the corner. Bow Tie drill has helped us win a lot of battles in the corner and beating an attacking forward to our net.
